name: beyondtrust-privileged-remote-access
label: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access
description: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access controls, manages, and audits privileged accounts and credentials. This enables just-in-time, zero trust access to on-premises and cloud resources by internal, external, and third-party users.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: host
fields.tooltip: URL of the BeyondTrust server to connect and perform automated operations
fields.description: URL of the BeyondTrust server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.name: client_id
fields.tooltip: Client ID of the BeyondTrust server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: Client ID of the BeyondTrust server to connect and perform automated operations. Refer to the section Accessing the BeyondTrust API for information on getting the client ID.

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.name: client_secret
fields.tooltip: Client Secret used to access the BeyondTrust server to connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.description: Client Secret used to access the BeyondTrust server to connect and perform the automated operations. Refer to the section Accessing the BeyondTrust API for information on getting the client secret.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Get Account List From Vault
operations.description: Retrieves a list of accounts from the BeyondTrust vault based on the filter criteria like name, type, account group, and any other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify a name to retrieve a list of accounts from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified name.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a name to retrieve a list of accounts from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified name.

parameters.name: include_personal
parameters.title: Include Personal
parameters.tooltip: Select to include personal accounts in response. By default, it only retrieves shared accounts.
parameters.description: (Optional) Select to include personal accounts in response. By default, it only retrieves shared accounts.

parameters.name: type
parameters.title: Account Type
parameters.tooltip: Select an account type to retrieve from BeyondTrust vault.
parameters.description:
(Optional) Select an account type to retrieve from BeyondTrust vault. You can choose from following options: 
Password 
SSH

parameters.name: account_group_id
parameters.title: Account Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify an account group ID to filters results that include only those accounts that match the specified BeyondTrust vault account group.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify an account group ID to filters results that include only those accounts that match the specified BeyondTrust vault account group.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page value should be greater than 0.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page value should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. The value should be between 5 and 100.

operations.title: Create Account in Vault
operations.description: Creates an account in BeyondTrust vault.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify a name for the BeyondTrust vault account to be created.
parameters.description: Specify a name for the BeyondTrust vault account to be created.

parameters.name: username
parameters.title: Username
parameters.tooltip: Specify the username to store in or retrieve from BeyondTrust vault.
parameters.description:
Specify the username to store in or retrieve from BeyondTrust vault. The username can be used as follows: 
Inject for authentication during remote access 
Store in Vault 
Retrieve from Vault

parameters.name: type
parameters.title: Account Type
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of account being created in BeyondTrust vault.
parameters.description:
Specify the type of account being created in BeyondTrust vault. You can choose from following options: 
Password: Select this option when storing login credentials in the form of a username and password. 
SSH: Select this option when storing login credentials in the form of an SSH key and passphrase.

Password.name: password
Password.title: Password
Password.tooltip: Specify the password to retrieve from BeyondTrust vault and inject for a remote access.
Password.description: Specify the password to retrieve from BeyondTrust vault and inject for a remote access. The password field is write-only.

Password.name: account_policy
Password.title: Account Policy Name
Password.tooltip: Specify The code name of the account policy associated with the account. When left blank, the account policy is inherited from the account group.
Password.description: (Optional) Specify The code name of the account policy associated with the account. When left blank, the account policy is inherited from the account group. If there is no account group, it is inherited from the global default.

SSH.name: private_key
SSH.title: Private Key
SSH.tooltip: Specify the private SSH key that to retrieve from BeyondTrust vault and inject for a remote access.
SSH.description: Specify the private SSH key that to retrieve from BeyondTrust vault and inject for a remote access.

SSH.name: private_key_passphrase
SSH.title: Passphrase
SSH.tooltip: Specify the passphrase that unlocks the specified private key.
SSH.description: (Optional) Specify the passphrase that unlocks the specified private key.

SSH.name: private_key_public_cert
SSH.title: Public Certificate
SSH.tooltip: Specify the public certificate to use for authentication.
SSH.description: (Optional) Specify the public certificate to use for authentication.

parameters.name: description
parameters.title: Description
parameters.tooltip: Specify a description of the account to be created in BeyondTrust vault.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a description of the account to be created in BeyondTrust vault.

parameters.name: account_group_id
parameters.title: Account Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the unique identifier for the BeyondTrust Vault Account Group. It defaults to 1, the default Account Group.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the unique identifier for the BeyondTrust Vault Account Group. It defaults to 1, the default Account Group.

operations.title: Delete Account From Vault
operations.description: Deletes an account from vault in BeyondTrust based on the account ID you have specified. NOTE: This action cannot delete personal account.

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.name: account_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of account to delete from the BeyondTrust vault.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of account to delete from the BeyondTrust vault.

operations.title: Checkin or Checkout Credentials From Vault
operations.description: Checks in or checks out private key or password from the vault in BeyondTrust based on the account ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Operation
parameters.name: operation
parameters.tooltip: Select the operation to perform on credentials associated with the specified account ID.
parameters.description:
Select the operation to perform on credentials associated with the specified account ID. You can choose from following options: 
Check In 
Check Out

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.name: account_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the account ID whose credentials you are checking in or checking out from BeyondTrust vault.
parameters.description: Specify the account ID whose credentials you are checking in or checking out from BeyondTrust vault.

operations.title: Get Vault Account Policy List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of account policies from BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name and pagination parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Policy Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify a name of the account policy to filter the account policy list retrieved from BeyondTrust.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a name of the account policy to filter the account policy list retrieved from BeyondTrust. NOTE: Policy name matches are case-insensitive and exact. Partial matches are not returned.

parameters.name: code_name
parameters.title: Policy Code Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify a code name of the account policy to filter the account policy list retrieved from BeyondTrust.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a code name of the account policy to filter the account policy list retrieved from BeyondTrust. NOTE: Policy name matches are case-insensitive and exact. Partial matches are not returned.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.placeholder: Page value should be greater than 0
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page value should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. The value should be between 5 and 100.

operations.title: Get Vault Account Group List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of account groups from BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name and pagination parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Group Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify a name of the account group to filter the account group list retrieved from BeyondTrust.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a name of the account group to filter the account group list retrieved from BeyondTrust. NOTE: Group name matches are case-insensitive and exact. Partial matches are not returned.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page value should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. The value should be between 5 and 100.

operations.title: Get User List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of users from BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like username, email ID, security provider ID, and other parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: username
parameters.title: Username
parameters.tooltip: Specify a username to retrieve a list of users from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified username.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a username to retrieve a list of users from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified username.

parameters.name: email_address
parameters.title: Email ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify an email ID to retrieve a list of users from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified email address.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify an email ID to retrieve a list of users from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified email address.

parameters.name: security_provider_id
parameters.title: Security Provider ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify a security provider ID to retrieve a list of users from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified security provider ID.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a security provider ID to retrieve a list of users from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified security provider ID.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page value should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. The value should be between 5 and 100.

operations.title: Get Vault Endpoint List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of vault endpoints from vault in BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name, hostname, domain name and other parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Endpoint Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify an endpoint name to retrieve a list of endpoints from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified endpoint.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify an endpoint name to retrieve a list of endpoints from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified endpoint.

parameters.name: hostname
parameters.title: Host Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify a hostname to retrieve a list of endpoints from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified hostname.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a hostname to retrieve a list of endpoints from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified hostname.

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify a domain name to retrieve a list of endpoints from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified domain name.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a domain name to retrieve a list of endpoints from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified domain name.

parameters.name: description
parameters.title: Description
parameters.tooltip: Specify a description to retrieve a list of endpoints from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified description.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a description to retrieve a list of endpoints from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified description.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page value should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. The value should be between 5 and 100.

operations.title: Get Vendor Group List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of vendor groups from BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name and pagination parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Vendor Group Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify a name of the vendor group to retrieve a list of vendor groups from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified vendor group name.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a name of the vendor group to retrieve a list of vendor groups from BeyondTrust vault that match the specified vendor group name.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page value should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. The value should be between 5 and 100.

operations.title: Create Vendor Group
operations.description: Creates a vendor group in BeyondTrust based on the Vendor Group Name, Policy ID, and other parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Vendor Group Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify a name for the BeyondTrust vendor group to be created.
parameters.description: Specify a name for the BeyondTrust vendor group to be created.

parameters.name: default_policy
parameters.title: Policy ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the group policy ID associated with the vendor group. NOTE: The group policy cannot grant administrative privileges.
parameters.description: Specify the group policy ID associated with the vendor group. NOTE: The group policy cannot grant administrative privileges.

parameters.name: administrator_id
parameters.title: Administrator ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the remote access user who receives emails as notifications or when user approvals are required. The user must have a valid email address, correct SMTP server Configurations, and notifications enabled to receive emails.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the remote access user who receives emails as notifications or when user approvals are required. The user must have a valid email address, correct SMTP server Configurations, and notifications enabled to receive emails.

parameters.name: account_expiration
parameters.title: Accounts Expire After
parameters.tooltip: Specify the duration(in days) after which the user accounts in the vendor group expire. By default, this parameter is set to 30 days.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the duration(in days) after which the user accounts in the vendor group expire. By default, this parameter is set to 30 days. The specified value should be between 1 and 365.

parameters.name: user_added_notification_enabled
parameters.title: Notify the PRA User when a user is added
parameters.tooltip: Select to notify the Privileged Remote Access(PRA) user whenever a user is added to the vendor group.
parameters.description: Select to notify the Privileged Remote Access(PRA) user whenever a user is added to the vendor group. NOTE: If the Require PRA User approval to activate users checkbox is selected then this option must be selected.

parameters.name: user_expired_notification_enabled
parameters.title: Notify the PRA User when a user has expired
parameters.tooltip: Select to notify the Privileged Remote Access (PRA) user when a user has expired in the vendor group. NOTE: Do not select this checkbox if the Notify the PRA User when a user is added checkbox is not selected.
parameters.description: Select to notify the Privileged Remote Access (PRA) user when a user has expired in the vendor group. NOTE: Do not select this checkbox if the Notify the PRA User when a user is added checkbox is not selected.

parameters.name: user_approval_enabled
parameters.title: Require PRA User approval to activate users
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to require an approval by a Privileged Remote Access (PRA) user to activate users in the vendor group.
parameters.description: Select this option to require an approval by a Privileged Remote Access (PRA) user to activate users in the vendor group.

true.name: user_reactivation_enabled
true.title: Require PRA User approval to extend or reactivate users
true.tooltip: Select this option to require an approval by a Privileged Remote Access (PRA) user to extend or reactivate users in the vendor group.
true.description: Select this option to require an approval by a Privileged Remote Access (PRA) user to extend or reactivate users in the vendor group.

parameters.name: network_restrictions
parameters.title: Network Address Allow List
parameters.tooltip: Specify the network address allow list related to network restrictions. you can specify multiple network addresses using comma separator.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the network address allow list related to network restrictions. you can specify multiple network addresses as comma-separated values.

operations.title: Get Vendor Group Details
operations.description: Retrieves the vendor group details from BeyondTrust based on the Vendor Group ID you have specified.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.title: Vendor Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of vendor group whose details are to be retrieved from BeyondTrust.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of vendor group whose details are to be retrieved from BeyondTrust.

operations.title: Update Vendor Group
operations.description: Updates a vendor group in BeyondTrust based on the Vendor Group ID, Vendor Group Name, Policy ID, and other parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.title: Vendor Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify ID of vendor group to be updated.
parameters.description: Specify ID of vendor group to be updated.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Vendor Group Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify a new name for the BeyondTrust vendor group to be updated.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a new name for the BeyondTrust vendor group to be updated.

parameters.name: default_policy
parameters.title: Policy ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the group policy ID associated with the vendor group. Note: The group policy cannot grant administrative privileges.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the group policy ID associated with the vendor group. NOTE: The group policy cannot grant administrative privileges.

parameters.name: account_expiration
parameters.title: Accounts Expire After
parameters.tooltip: Specify the duration(in days) after which the user accounts in the vendor group expire.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the duration(in days) after which the user accounts in the vendor group expire. By default, this parameter is set to 30 days. The specified value should be between 1 and 365.

parameters.name: user_added_notification_enabled
parameters.title: Notify the PRA User when a user is added
parameters.tooltip: Select to notify the Privileged Remote Access(PRA) user whenever a user is added to the vendor group. NOTE: If the Require PRA User approval to activate users checkbox is selected then this option must be selected. In such cases, the Administrator ID parameter becomes mandatory and must be provided when enabling this feature.
parameters.description: Select to notify the Privileged Remote Access(PRA) user whenever a user is added to the vendor group. NOTE: If the Require PRA User approval to activate users checkbox is selected then this option must be selected. In such cases, the Administrator ID parameter becomes mandatory and must be provided when enabling this feature.

parameters.name: user_expired_notification_enabled
parameters.title: Notify the PRA User when a user has expired
parameters.tooltip: Select to notify the Privileged Remote Access (PRA) user when a user has expired in the vendor group. NOTE: Do not select this checkbox if the Notify the PRA User when a user is added checkbox is not selected.
parameters.description: Select to notify the Privileged Remote Access (PRA) user when a user has expired in the vendor group. NOTE: Do not select this checkbox if the Notify the PRA User when a user is added checkbox is not selected.

parameters.name: user_approval_enabled
parameters.title: Require PRA User approval to activate users
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to require an approval by a Privileged Remote Access (PRA) user to activate users in the vendor group. NOTE: Specify a value in the Administrator ID parameter if this checkbox is selected.
parameters.description: Select this option to require an approval by a Privileged Remote Access (PRA) user to activate users in the vendor group. NOTE: Specify a value in the Administrator ID parameter if this checkbox is selected.

true.name: user_reactivation_enabled
true.title: Require PRA User approval to extend or reactivate users
true.tooltip: Select this option to require an approval by a Privileged Remote Access (PRA) user to extend or reactivate users in the vendor group.
true.description: Select this option to require an approval by a Privileged Remote Access (PRA) user to extend or reactivate users in the vendor group.

parameters.name: administrator_id
parameters.title: Administrator ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the remote access user who receives emails as notifications or when user approvals are required. The user must have a valid email address, correct SMTP server Configurations, and notifications enabled to receive emails.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the ID of the remote access user who receives emails as notifications or when user approvals are required. The user must have a valid email address, correct SMTP server Configurations, and notifications enabled to receive emails.

parameters.name: network_restrictions
parameters.title: Network Address Allow List
parameters.tooltip: Specify the network address allow list related to network restrictions. you can specify multiple network addresses as comma-separated values.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the network address allow list related to network restrictions. you can specify multiple network addresses as comma-separated values.

operations.title: Delete Vendor Group
operations.description: Deletes a specific vendor group from BeyondTrust based on the Vendor Group ID you have specified..

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.title: Vendor Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify ID of vendor group which to be deleted from BeyondTrust.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of vendor group to be deleted from BeyondTrust.

operations.title: Get User List in Vendor Group
operations.description: Retrieves a list of users in a vendor group based on the filter criteria like Vendor Group ID, pagination parameters, and other parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.title: Vendor Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the vendor group from which the list of users is to be retrieved.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the vendor group from which the list of users is to be retrieved.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page value should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. The value should be between 5 and 100.

operations.title: Create User in Vendor Group
operations.description: Creates a user in a BeyondTrust vendor group based on the Vendor Group ID, Username, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.title: Vendor Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the vendor group in which to create the user.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the vendor group in which to create the user.

parameters.name: username
parameters.title: Username
parameters.tooltip: Specify the username of the user to be created in the vendor group.
parameters.description: Specify the username of the user to be created in the vendor group.

parameters.name: public_display_name
parameters.title: Display Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the display name of the user to be created in the vendor group.
parameters.description: Specify the display name of the user to be created in the vendor group.

parameters.name: password
parameters.title: Password
parameters.tooltip: Specify the password of the user to be created in the vendor group.
parameters.description: Specify the password of the user to be created in the vendor group.

parameters.name: email_address
parameters.title: Email Address
parameters.tooltip: Specify the email address of the user to be created in the vendor group.
parameters.description: Specify the email address of the user to be created in the vendor group.

parameters.name: password_never_expire
parameters.title: Password Never Expire
parameters.tooltip: Select this option for the user's password to never expire.
parameters.description: Select this option for the user's password to never expire.

false.name: password_expiration
false.title: Password Expiration Date
false.tooltip: Specify the date and time when the user's password expires.
false.description: Specify the date and time when the user's password expires.

parameters.name: password_reset_next_login
parameters.title: Must Reset Password at Next Login
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to force the user to change their password on their next login.
parameters.description: Select this option to force the user to change their password on their next login. By default, this option is unchecked, i.e., it is set to false.

parameters.name: account_disabled
parameters.title: Account Disabled
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to disable this user's account. If selected, the user is not allowed to login.
parameters.description: Select this option to disable this user's account. If selected, the user is not allowed to login.

parameters.name: preferred_email_language
parameters.title: Preferred Email Language
parameters.tooltip: Specify the preferred email language of the user to be created in the vendor group.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the preferred email language of the user to be created in the vendor group. By default it is set to en-us.

operations.title: Get User Details in Vendor Group
operations.description: Retrieves details of user in a BeyondTrust vendor group based on the User ID and Vendor Group ID you have specified.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.title: Vendor Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the vendor group from which to retrieve the list of users.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the vendor group from which to retrieve the list of users.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.title: User ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the user whose details are to be retrieved.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the user whose details are to be retrieved.

operations.title: Remove User from Vendor Group
operations.description: Removes a user from a BeyondTrust vendor group based on the User ID and Vendor Group ID you have specified.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.title: Vendor Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the vendor group from which to remove the user.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the vendor group from which to remove the user.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.title: User ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the user to remove from the specified vendor group.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the user to remove from the specified vendor group.

operations.title: Get Group Policy List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of group policies from BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like Policy Name and pagination parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Policy Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the group policy to be retrieved from BeyondTrust. NOTE: Policy name matches are case-insensitive and exact. Partial matches are not returned.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the name of the group policy to be retrieved from BeyondTrust. NOTE: Policy name matches are case-insensitive and exact. Partial matches are not returned.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page value should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. The value should be between 5 and 100.
